name: Ooze Extractor
description:
ROGUELIKE TOWER DEFENSE

You control an auto-attacking farmer, who has gone to the moon to collect an oozy substance, which is rumored to be 1000 times more effective at fertilizing crops, than the stuff they have back in earth. Aliens aren't too pleased about you stealing their ooze though. Grow plants to help protect the ooze extractor from attackers!

FEATURES:

Auto attacking player. Point the player character towards enemies, and chain consecutive hits together to give your defense a damage boost.

Upgrade plants with branching skill trees. Build the optimal defense, by carefully choosing which branching skill tree path a plant takes.

Reforming map, forcing you to constantly rethink your defense.

CONTROLS:

ARROW KEYS - Move Player

SPACE - Use Objects

DISCORD

Join Antenna Games Discord-server! https://discord.gg/kQdXU3r2Dn

- This game was made in 2 weeks for the NoticeMe Game Jam -
